Recommended cyclophosphamide dosing adjustment:
- On day 10 post infusion blood work, if total WBC nadir is less than 2.5 X10^9 L and/or if neutrophil count is less than 1X10^9 L, consider reducing next dose
- On day of infusion, if neutrophil count is less than 1X10^9 L, consider delaying dose until count recovery is demonstrated
- Consider dose adjustment if significant renal impairment. Consult with nephrology

Cyclophosphamide dose monitoring:
- Document dose number
- Document cumulative dose to date
